AdditionalFields.Value: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science,Cancer Evolution

Description: An ongoing challenge in cancer therapy is to overcome the evolution of chemo-resistance which is thought to be a major cause of tumor recurrence and disease progression.  Our session will provide an overview and snapshot into approaches for integrating the evolutionary dynamics of the disease into therapeutic approaches designed to delay chemo-resistance using longitudinal patient data from clinical trials, computer simulations based on evolutionary principles, mathematical models, bioinformatic approaches  based on population genetic theory and statistical inference applied to genomic and spatially-resolved clinical cohorts, as well as methods from AI.
PrimaryCategory: Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science
SearchResultBody: SY29. Modeling Cancer Evolutionary Dynamics: The Interface of Big Data, Simulations and AI
Title: Modeling Cancer Evolutionary Dynamics: The Interface of Big Data, Simulations and AI
